main event: An unidentified object was observed in Nahant, Massachusetts on June 25, 1952.
interesting points: Two disk-shaped bluish lights were observed traveling side-by-side at high speed,The objects were seen at an altitude of 1,000 to 1,500 feet,The sighting lasted for approximately 3 minutes before the lights disappeared,No sound was heard during the observation,The sighting was reported to the Coast Guard.
